br.usp.poli.takiyama.samples
Class WaterSprinklerNetwork

java.lang.Object
  br.usp.poli.takiyama.samples.WaterSprinklerNetwork

public final class WaterSprinklerNetwork
extends java.lang.Object

Water sprinkler network proposed by Kevin Murphy. The network was adapted to a lifted version: sprinkler and wet_grass are random variables parameterized on a logical variable Lot.

The original network is shown here

The number of nodes in this network is 2 * (domainSize + 1)

Author:
Felipe Takiyama
